content.rendered:
OFFER EXIPRES in 20 mins and 36 sec…
The special offer for the Swing Plate Has Expired. You can still purchase your Swing Plate at the link below!

This Is My #1 Recommended Practice Tool for Shallowing the Club… and I Secured a Discount for You as a New Owner of the 20 Minute Shallowing Fix.

Offer valid only until the timer runs out

Thanks again for investing in the 20 Minute Shallowing Fix. With this program, you have everything you need to fix your contact, eliminate your slice, and dial in your consistency. You’ll discover the easiest way to shallow the club and start hitting beautiful draws.

And if you want to get all of that in the shortest time possible, then I highly recommend practicing what I’ll show you in the program using the Swing Plate. It’s my favorite practice tool for knowing exactly what angle to swing on to shallow the club like the pros. 

It’s the BEST way to reinforce what you’re learning, and it works whether you’re a high, medium, or low handicap.

Because whether you’re steep in the downswing, coming over the top and struggling with pulls and slices… 

Or shallower in the downswing, but standing up out of your posture and hooking the ball…

You’ll whack the alignment stick and get immediate feedback that your swing is off.

Practicing with feedback is key. Without it, you stand over the ball and have no way to visualize the proper angle of attack. No way to “feel” what’s right or wrong.

When you use the Swing Plate to practice my shallowing techniques, you set the alignment rod to the same angle as the pros and then practice swinging under it without hitting it.

It’s so easy.

Just miss the stick and all of a sudden, you’re shallowed out and coming from the inside.

And when you make those repetitions over and over, you groove the feeling of proper shallowing and burn it into muscle memory.

Here’s why the Swing Plate is the perfect match for the 20 Minute Shallowing Fix…

  • Almost automatically shallows out your downswing
  • Shallows it out at the exact same angle as tour players (and never even get one degree off)
  • Never try shallowing it out blindly again–and eliminate the risk of developing even worse swing mechanics!
  • Virtually eliminate off-plane swings by snapping The Swing Plate in place (not only does this get your swing on plane, but it automatically gives you the feeling of a proper shaft angle).
  • Shallows out even the STEEPEST downswing in a matter of minutes (if you’ve been trying to do this for months, this is the BEST way to get the feel of shallowing it out at just the right angle)!

Pictured above is the Swing Plate “Angle Finder”

Whether you ‘come over the top’, have a ‘flat backswing’, or ‘sway’ in the backswing, you can learn to fix your swing using the Swing Plate.

Small enough to fit in your golf bag, use the Swing Plate on the range, at home, or in an indoor swing studio. The Swing Plate is fully adjustable for both left- and right-handed golfers, and fits your own alignment rods.

The Swing Plate gives you consistent, purposeful, and precise practice for shallowing the club.

Save $20 as a new member of the Top Speed Golf family…

You have two choices when purchasing the Swing Plate: you can purchase it without alignment rods if you have your own, or you can purchase the Swing Plate plus alignment rods (with foam protectors) if you do not.

Either way, when you purchase on this page before the timer runs out, you’ll save $20 off the normal retail price!

Buy a Swing Plate today and it will ship same day or next business day so that you have it ASAP while going through the 20 Minute Distance Fix.

It is the perfect complement to the 20 Minute Shallowing Fix, which is why I secured a special discount for you today.

But this offer is only good until the timer on this page hits zero. So add a Swing Plate to your order now and get a consistent, reliable swing faster than ever.

In the spirit of full disclosure, I will make a small commission on your purchase of the Swing Plate. This will help me to keep creating great content for you!

Option 1: Swing Plate Base Model – no alignment rods

Swing Plate base model. No alignment rods included. Works with 8mm (0.315″) diameter rods which are the standard size for nearly all alignment sticks sold.

Retail: $114.99

Get Clay’s discount & add to your order today for just$94.99!

+ $11 flat rate shipping

Ships within 1 business day

Option 2: Swing Plate with alignment rods and foam protector

Note: Though not pictured above, your purchase of the Swing Plate + alignment rods comes with 3 total rods, one swing plane rod and two ground target rods.

Retail: $134.99

Get Clay’s discount & add to your order today for just$114.99!

+ $11 flat rate shipping

Ships within 1 business day

No thanks. I do not want Clay’s discount on the Swing Plate. I will practice shallowing the club on my own, without feedback.
